title: Legal Notice
text:
ODEKA A.S.B.L is a ________ nonprofit organization registered in the Democratic Republic of the Congo. It is incorporated in the Province of Central Kasaï under registration number ________, with its principal office located at:
ODEKA A.S.B.L 6, avenue du Commerce L/AZDA (Cinquantenaire) Q/TSHINSAMBI C/KANANGA KASAÏ CENTRAL, RDC.
ODEKA A.S.B.L’s mission is to support evidence-based development initiatives in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
